keyword.name: Num Groups
keyword.description: Specify whether grid of work-groups is 1D, 2D or 3D and specify size for each dimension

keyword.name: Verbose
keyword.description: Show commands to run and use verbose output

keyword.name: Only intra-group
keyword.description: Do not check for inter-group races

keyword.name: Local size
keyword.description: Specify whether work-group is 1D, 2D or 3D and specify size for each dimension

keyword.name: Only divergence
keyword.description: Only check for barrier divergence, not for races
